SELECT * from ( SELECT t.id, t.user_name, t.user_account, t.password, t.credential_salt, t.org_id, t.description, t.active,t.created,t.creater,t.modified,t.modifier, t.role_id, MAX(CASE t.cfg_name WHEN 'channel_id' THEN cfg_val1 ELSE 0 END ) channel_id, MAX(CASE t.cfg_name WHEN 'store_id' THEN cfg_val1 ELSE 0 END ) store_id FROM
(select u.id, u.user_name, u.user_account, u.password, u.credential_salt, u.org_id, u.description, u.active,u.created,u.creater,u.modified,u.modifier, ur.role_id, rc.cfg_name, GROUP_CONCAT(rc.cfg_val1) as cfg_val1 from com_user u, com_user_role ur, com_role r, com_role_config rc where u.id = ur.user_id and ur.role_id = rc.role_id and u.active <> 0 and r.active = 1 GROUP BY id, rc.cfg_name) t
GROUP BY t.id )t1
